website_summaries.verdict: This light, ultra packable fringed sarong can go with you anywhere, from beach to casual dining.
pros: A classic style that will suit and fit all body types, this hand screen printed rayon pareo made in Bali can be worn as a skirt or a dress, with easy to follow instructions for how to style it
Comes in a range of colors, all in large flower prints
cons: On occasion there were some variations in the shades of the fabric, due to the hand printing

customer_reviews.title: Great for plus size!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” and roughly 300lbs. I bought this while specifically looking up plus size swim covers. It’s super cute, and is easier to wrap around my waist as a skirt, but I was able to wrap it around my body as a dress, which was exciting for me as I usually can’t get a towel to do that, so I wasn’t expecting a great full body wrap around, but it actually worked out nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tate

customer_reviews.title: but low and behold it fit beautifully. For those who are big and beautiful such ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 20 so I was a little worried it would not fit, but low and behold it fit beautifully. For those who are big and beautiful such as myself, it works as a great cover up. I will say, the black looks more navy but that's the only "down side".
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and perfect for beach time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking all over online for a swimsuit cover skirt for my upcoming cruise. When I found this 1 world sarong on Amazon, I liked the fact that it can be worn as a skirt and a dress to wear over my bikini. I ordered the black/pink flower sarong, and I love it. I can fold it and wear it short, or leave it as is and it flows down to my ankles. The material is very nice, and I like the tassels along the two edges. I am 5'4" and 175lbs and it fits perfectly with room to spare, I definitely will be ordering more colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Luau Hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a luau as I did not want to go the grass skirt route. The instructions for wearing it were easy to follow. I got a lot of compliments. I am 5 feet 5 inches and 145 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My sarong was beautiful! However
customer_reviews.text: My sarong was beautiful! However, because I'm 5' 3 (3/4)" inches tall and 163 lbs., my sarong did not fit like how the model's did-it was tighter because of my hips, thighs, and back side. I will still give it a 5 star, but advise that if you are voluptuous and on the thick side, be prepared to not have the excess coverage like the models displayed. I also wore it tied like a dress so that it knotted at the back of my neck. It looked it I was being choked, but I still got compliments on it anyway. It does best being tied around my waist until perhaps I lose some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Byerly

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Bathing Suit Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I used this sarong as a swimsuit cover during a vacation and I loved it! It folds up small and is easy to carry, and the thin material is perfect for covering a bathing suit without being hot in the sun or heavy when wet. If it does get wet, it drys quickly. It is just large enough to tie a variety of ways. I think that it is a little too small and thin to be used as regular clothing, but the black-and-red wasn't really see-through and the pattern was verry pretty. Overall, this sarong perfectly fit what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.author: A. Leigh Ford

customer_reviews.title: Hibiscus flower sarong
customer_reviews.text: This sarong is beautiful. The contrast of the bright flowers on the dark background is really striking. The print is on both sides of the fabric so you don't have to be mindful of which way you're putting it on. It's made from very soft and comfortable rayon, perfect for warm weather. And there are SO many different ways you can wear these! Google "How to tie a sarong" and you'll find dozens of cute ways to wear it. Shipping was lightning fast, arrived in 2 days! Would definitely recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Syrenia Snow

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I received it a few mins ago. I haven't wore it but OMG I love it! The only downside is that it's only printed on one side but that's ok with me. It's lightweight and not too sheer. In the house I'll tie it on my chest... But out in public I'll tie it at my hips... Wearing shorts under.. And wear it as a skirt. I use all my pareos or sarongs as a skirt with a cute top. I will definitely buy more colors from this company. For anyone wondering about the size I wear a size 14 and this fits me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING but not without issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL sarong. I bought one just like it last summer and two people walked up to me to ask where I got it because it was "stunning". The only issue is it is not very durable. Last summer, the winds and sand on the beach caused it to tear . I sewed it but when I washed it the fringes came out tangled. I would say it is a 5 STAR sarong for beauty and usefulness as a cover but downgraded it to 4 STAR cause I bought another one due to the durability issues described. Still for the money, I obviously thought it was worth buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Cerie

customer_reviews.title: Came torn
customer_reviews.text: I received my sarong with about a 3 inch tear in it.(first picture) I tried to wear it anyway and it just tore more throughout the day. After maybe 5 hours of wearing, the tear is now about 2 feet long. (Second picture) It’s very pretty so I’m bummed I only got to wear it once.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a swim suit cover up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sarong to bring on a cruise. It is the perfect size for a swim suit coverup. However, I ended using it more for coverage on my shoulders. I get sunburnt easily and never once did I get a burn while wearing this shawl. And, when I did not need it for coverage it folded up nicely in my purse. The 10 people on my tour in Saint Thomas loved that it was absorbent since I offered it to clean off the wet bus seats after a rain :)
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this sarong
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this sarong. We went on a cruise for our honeymoon and I got so many compliments on this sarong. I am 5'1" and about a size 14/16. This was plenty long (too long for me almost lol) and plenty wide to be used as a cover up. I am very fair-skinned so I used it to keep my shoulders, arms, and chest out of the sun when lounging, and to cover up when headed back to our stateroom or to sit at the bar. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AggieMoose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and material, but...
customer_reviews.text: The sarong is beautiful. The material is soft. I have no problem with the quality of the sarong (hence my 3 stars). My disappointment is that they were advertised as extra-long. They are no longer than many of the other sarongs I currently own. I can wrap the sarong around my waist, from front to back (or reverse) and then tie. That's not what I wanted. I wanted extra long to do a complete one and a half wrap. The styles idea are beautiful, but I can't see how many of them would work unless the model or person wearing it is very petite.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene McDonald

customer_reviews.title: The print is only on one side
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband who loves wearing sarongs. He's really disappointed because the print is only on one side. Sarongs are so versatile in part because there is no front or back. This one definitely has a front and back which is unfortunate. We can buy them locally but haven't been able to find a black one. We gave this a shot but we'll probably keep buying local instead from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" 220lbs and this thing fits fantstic. I wear mine around my waste and its all the way to the floor which I love. I would 100% buy this again and again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. Soft and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide hips and there was still plenty of room to tie around my hips or anywhere I wanted. It is also very soft and very pretty in person. I never knew I needed one of these in my life but we're going to be pretty much exclusively on the beach for a week on our honeymoon so I picked one up and I am so glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Cute Swimsuit Cover-Up
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT and so adorable. I almost want to buy a strapless slip to wear underneath so I can wear it as a normal dress. It apparently has a ton of different ways you can tie it on the website, but I stuck with the one in the picture and loved it. I bought it in two different patterns and if anything happens to either, I will definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: jvic

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE BUT NOT PLUS SIZE AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and the colors are beautiful. Being a plus size person (18-20) this doesn't give much room for options on tying it. I could only tie the corners together to have it like a skirt/dress.... so all the tutorials I watched on youtube for cute ways to tie it were wasted! But, still glad I got it and will be using it for beach time or when i'm fishing to keep the sun off my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Porter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lovely black and orange sarong for a Mexican cruise. I used this as a swim suit coverup, as a shawl with my black dress for dinner and for walking the promenade deck in the cool evening. Since returning home have used as a scarf also. Material is good quality, held together well. folds up small enough to bring in a bag for daytrips. It got damp several times with daily use at the pool but dried quickly with simply laying flat on the bed. VERY pretty, received several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: This is not for anyone over a size 16.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I thought this was going to be a big sarong after reading the reviews. Nope. NOT FOR BIGGER GIRLS!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Cicotte

customer_reviews.title: Loved it... while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cruise. I got to wear it once in Jamaica... I got tons of compliments on it. It's beautiful. I let it hang too long and someone stepped on it though and it ripped right in half. :( The material is very thin. I had to throw it away after that. I bought a couple more in Mexico, so I wont reorder, but I really did love this sarong... and so did many others.
customer_reviews.author: CrabbShack

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our week long trip to Maui in December. It was perfect to cover up on the beach when the wind kicked up, or if I felt like I was getting too much sun. The sarong was exactly as advertised, and held up through the few washings I have done.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Soft material
customer_reviews.text: I like the material the sarong is made from. The size works great for me. (5’4” 195 lbs) The only bad thing is I ordered a black with white print and the one I received was white with hot pink flowers and green leaves. Which wasn’t even a choice to pick from when I looked back. 🤔 I wanted it for the next day so I didn’t try to return it, I just went with it. It’s pretty just not what I would’ve picked.
customer_reviews.author: T Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this purchase since I am plus sized (20/22) and it fit beautifully. The fabric is very soft and feel great against my skin. It's thin enough to dry fast, but not transparent and the color was true to the photo. Not complaining, but my only wish was that there were more patterns to choose from for non beachy situations.
customer_reviews.author: Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in photo unless you’re a very small lady, maybe 100lbs, 5ft tall
customer_reviews.text: The photo shown displays the sarong wrapped at the neck, unfortunately there isn’t enough material to wear it like that, at least the one I purchased. I’m 5’3 140 lbs. if you’re able to wrap as shown in the photo, you must be very small in statue. Too much material for a neck scarf. If you’re looking for a wrap around for the waist you’ll be ok if you’re not to large of a person. Wouldn’t order again based on the photo of what I wanted and the actual end ability to only use as a waist wrap around.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: No free gift came with it.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this wrap. I bought the black with red flowers. The material is soft and the red is bright. It is beautiful I took one star away because it said “free gift” and I assumed it was a metal buckle/clasp but nothing came in the package.
customer_reviews.author: francine13

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute!! Our team had a luau contest at softball Nationals and we wanted something different than the grass skirts everybody else would have so we went with these and the girls looked so cute
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Adkins

customer_reviews.title: That's a wrap
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap and get many compliments on it. It is lightweight but sturdy. It dries quickly and I have run it through the wash several times without consequence. The pattern is bright and crisp. It is my favorite pool party accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Bee S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Size 18/20
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality sarong, not see through, and fits a size 18/20 perfectly. I only wear it around my waist, so I can't say how it would work otherwise, but it covered down to my ankles. I am around 5' 3". I am ordering it a second time as my first sarong got lost.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyShoreCountry

customer_reviews.title: pretty but just a scarf
customer_reviews.text: The materical is pretty but its bascially just a scarf. I thought there would be a tie to close it but you have to pull the materical and tie it together. Not worth sending back but not what I wanted or expected
customer_reviews.author: Annette Prianti

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but Color bleeds
customer_reviews.text: It is a very pretty sarong, however I could not seem to tie it to make it look good like it does on the model. The color bleeds ALOT. Good thing I hand washed it with nothing else. It was faded big time after so much color bled out.
customer_reviews.author: AquacatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Quality Sarong
customer_reviews.text: The Hibiscus Sarong Fuchsia and Black item is exactly what I expected! Beautiful! And there was an unexpected bracelet included! Thank you for going above and beyond! Looking forward to ordering again from you!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great Sarong!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this sarong and the solid blue fringeless sarong as well for a vacation to Mexico. There were exactly what I needed, I used them for cover-ups and even tied them into makeshift beach bags when needed. There were lightweight and dry very quickly. Easy to pack! The pattern on the Hibiscus Sarong is very pretty too. Just remember to wash them before you go so the dye doesn't run while you're on the beach and you're all good!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This sarong was just delivered, I immediately went in and put it on. So cool and comfy, love it. I’m a chubster @ 5’2”, 190lb & my pant length is 29. I wrapped it as a skirt and it is down to my ankles, perfect length. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty in Orange County

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Perfect! Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My co-worker was having a Hawaiian theme bridal/engagement party. A relative had provided a beautiful red Hawaiian shirt for him and a red dress for her. But brides being what they are, she wanted a white Hawaiian dress. Long story short, two weeks before the party, several outfits later, she still unhappy still looking for dresses. Got this for her, showed her how to tie to use as a wrap with sleeves, result: Happy Bride! Happy Bride = Happy everybody else.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Barton

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 Chance
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I do not know how to wrap this but ita ify on whether or not I will keep it. It's a beautiful piece of garment though and I do not like it for a cover up only. I wished for a dress like the model
customer_reviews.author: Justblessed

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!! I bought it to go with my swimsuit which has a black bottom and teal halter top... it matches beautifully! I tend to wear sarongs all summer while at the lake so have many different colors... this is my favorite hands down! Good quality, not too thin but not too thick, and washes up nicely! I will be buying from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough for the price. Beautiful print.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. A tad see through and I had to soak and rinse it 20 times in two days to get the water to be free from dye and to be comfortable washing it in the machine with other items. It is a beautiful print. Much more beautiful than the sarong I am replacing which was thicker material but which cost 35 dollars 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: CleaningCrazedMom

customer_reviews.title: #1 Beach Item
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our Honeymoon in Cabo. I have a larger chest (34FF) so it didn't fit amazing around me but it was pretty close that it worked fine from the beach to our room. My favorite part was all the things we used it for: coverup, towel to dry off, and beach blanket to sit on. It dries lighting fast because it is so thin, no sand sticked to it, and folds up to fit anywhere in your suitcase or beach bag. This is my number one beach item hands down.
customer_reviews.author: zooga

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful -- but has already fallen apart
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because the black sarong with flowers was absolutely beautiful. It fit well and I could wear it many ways -- when I wore it. I've only had it about 7 months and it has fallen apart after a couple of washes and little wear. I've had other sarongs which lasted years with much more use. I am extremely disappointed in my purchase because I have something so beautiful that I can't wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Horizon

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a cruise
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a Carribean Cruise and this was my go too for everything!!!!!! The obviouse cover up but also a lounge dress, shawl for cool theaters, beach blanket, and pj. I received to many compliments to count. Takes up very little room to pack or carry to the pool or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Isenhouer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Label was right, item was wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black & white pattern as I expected the fabric to be thin. As you can see in my photo, the pattern I received was the hibiscus even though the tag clearly says black/white. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sarongs
customer_reviews.text: These sarongs were the first I've purchased. I was headed to Hawaii and needed two for two very different swimsuits. They were perfect. The coverage, versatility and fabric were everything I needed. The color was just as vivid as advertised. They held up to sea water. I'd purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie1201

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Basic
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, and the fabric is not too thin. I like the feel of it, light, but with more weight than rayon. It is unadorned, intentionally, so I can wrap and tie it as I like. I am a little heavy for my height (5 ft 1+ in.) so there is enough to wrap around me once. I bought the blue/teal on black.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, opaque, nice colors
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft and opaque, the colors are nice. I got the Hibiscus Flower in Greenish Yellow - the green is what I would call avocado green, and I think it looks nice. It covered me well (5'6 and generally wear size 14). It doesn't take much water to soak it, but it's not meant to be a towel. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: ConiferousCentaur

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: This sarong is gorgeous just as it shows on the picture. Material is soft and quality. I’m only 5 feet and the sarong fits great since you can adjust it. My suggestion is to let the length touch the top of your toes so it lays like a long beautiful dress. With toes peeking out it looks very sensuous for the beach. I wore it recently and felt like I was ready for the island. I will definitely order more in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great material and awesome coloring
customer_reviews.text: I love how versatile it is. Material is great and colors are as vibrant as they appear. Very cute. Highly satisfied with my purchase... plus I love palm trees!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great sarong!
customer_reviews.text: Great color and lightweight material. Not sheer, but thin and perfect for the beach or as a coverup walking around. Bought two and wouldn't hesitate to buy again. I also ordered the coconut clip which works better than simply tying the wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty sarong
customer_reviews.text: Bright and pretty, and the color was true to the picture! I personally am not a big fan of the fringe, so cut it all off just below the knots, which for my tastes improved the look a lot, otherwise really like this sarong. On a tall figure, as expected, it doesn't fall quite so far down the leg.
customer_reviews.author: nightowl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This sarong is just what I was looking for at a reasonable price. I'm a little hefty and want the thighs covered! I got the black with hibiscus flower in aqua and the colors are vibrant. Sarong is soft and easy to use. I have not tried it out by getting it wet yet so I can not speak to its chlorine tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this every single day of our Mexican resort trip! I loved the coconut piece that helped tie it. It was a great length and size and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: I would not order again.
customer_reviews.text: I would not order this again - definitely not at this price. It was ok. Nothing special at all. I WAY prefer the rayon ones that hold their color and shape and don't need ironing. The fringe twisted in the dryer and there are color inconsistencies (where the cotton missed being printed by the color at all). :(
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wear this during my vacation in Hawaii and it was super light and comfortable. I just wish it had the instructions on different ways of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" 110 lbs. This is smaller than expected. Cant really tie this around, like other sarongs, into different configuration because it's not enough material.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda K.

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful and soft. The color is rich and eye catching. I am so happy i got this for the beach. Plan to pay again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Good fabric, well made. Pretty print (black and white floral). Nice size so can be used multiple ways. Washed well. I am pleased with this purchase. Prompt shipment, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with material
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful print but didn’t like the material. Next time will pay more attention when ordering more sarongs
customer_reviews.author: Carole Frankel

customer_reviews.title: Sorange
customer_reviews.text: I bought the garment and it was a little small very beautiful garment I am 230pounds so I bought two of the same and wore it as a skirt and top I got so many compliments on my garments.
customer_reviews.author: Dj4949

customer_reviews.title: Very vibrint color!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a five star, because as soon as I opened the package, I fell in love with the bright bold color. I washed it, and it didn't fade at all. I'm a little on the husky side, which stinks, so it doesn't wrap on me like a dress. However it works well for a cover up. I can't wait to use it, this week. Thank you so much, for having such wonderful colors. I will be ordering again from this business.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: great sarong... a must for the beach and as a cover up
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved this gift... she wore it every day of our beach vacation getaway... she mostly wore it as a dress and tied behind her neck... so she never needed the belt tie that i purchased also. She really adored it... walking to the beach... returning back home, in the car, to cafes.. everywhere... it made wearing a bathing suit an all day thing because she looked great and classy and breezy in her sarong wrap... beautiful design, light, soft... just great
customer_reviews.author: Lewis C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sarong
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 10 different sarongs before going to Hawaii as gifts, and this one quickly became mine! I is beautiful, comfortable, large enough to throw down and sit on, then shake off and wrap it on. The black dye bled onto all the other cloths when it got thrown into the laundry by accident, well now my husband has gray tee shirts.....Oh well, my mistake,the sarong was still beautiful even after being washed with a mixed load of beach cloths. This one is nicer than any i found in Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Sarongs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best.Summer just Arriving I can Wrap Around me and go.I put this on as soon as I got it.My family asked where are you GOING?ALL DRESSED UP?It's light weight.Great quilty cloth.Fabulous investment.I am ordering more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!! Well made, beautiful bright colors with beautiful fringe! And bonus got the cutest bracelet with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This was very nice but I out it in the wash on delicate ...
customer_reviews.text: This was very nice but I out it in the wash on delicate and it ripped in half, so the material wasn't very strong. IF you hand wash this the color is pretty and it looks nice on
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Never had a sarong but I needed one quickly for a cruise we were going on. Loved it. Used it nearly every day, dried super quick and my husband loved the way it looked. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Actually bought 3 different designs. Great as a swimsuit cover up or a skirt or a dress. So versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the print of this sarong. Red is my favorite color it’s looks wonderful on me. This is my first sarong, it’s light weight and flowey, draping nice on my body. I’ll be ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Beverly K. Amin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading SIze Info
customer_reviews.text: The stated dimensions are approximately 66"x44". However, the fabric itself (the part that covers your body) is only about 61". You get 66" when you add 2.5" fringes on both sides. I was counting on getting 66" of fabric, so I'm returning it. (The width is also not really 44", more like 43", unless you stretched out all the wrinkles.)
customer_reviews.author: KAT401

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: In love with it! Already bought another one. Though when I purchased the first one it said it included a free gift which I did not receive. I got an email stating if I leave a review, I will get a free gift as well so hopefully I get my gift finally! I hope it's a sarong tie! Anyway this is a must have! Great quality. #1worldsarongs
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for summer vacation. Colors are vibrant. Has been worn and washed often without any issues. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a little shorter than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was a good size to wrap around but a little short to do the style indicated on the tag where you wrap it around like a halter. It is very beautiful and well made. Receives a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M.

customer_reviews.title: This sarong hangs nicely and feels a lot more luxurious than what I ...
customer_reviews.text: This sarong hangs nicely and feels a lot more luxurious than what I paid for it. I can’t wait to wear it on my cruise with all the great suggestions on how to wear it that you sent with. Thank you, Pippa
customer_reviews.author: Pippa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a hot day in summer
customer_reviews.text: I love that it just something you can wear with whatever you have. I love this and this is the second one I have ordered. For sure I will be ordering more again. But I love wearing them around the house and to the pool and lake.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Masiwemai

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the feel of the fabric
customer_reviews.text: This sarong was just what I was looking for! I am going to use it for a swimsuit cover-up for our trip to Jamaica. I love the color and the feel of the fabric. It is not see through so you could wear it as a dress. I loved the fact that there were so many color choices. I chose the blue with hibiscus flowers and it is perfect for a beach vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but delicate.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but very delicate. It ripped at the fringe a bit after I took from wash and tried to separate fringes. I would have loved back and front to be same color but one side appears to be the inside as it is more opaque. I'm a size 12 and it's a bit smaller than I would have liked but still covered.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful sarong arrived quickly and is just what I was hoping for. It has vibrant colors, a good size to wrap around my body or use in a variety of ways. The material is thin but strong. I can fold it to a very small size to have in my suitcase or small backpack for travel.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Buha

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this sarong. It was a nice material. Great pattern. It also came with the little clasp thing. And more importantly it came with instructions because I had no idea how to use it. Will be buying more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: V. Shell

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. The size is great
customer_reviews.text: This is so thin. Mine was ripped and tearing after 1st use. Not quality material that will last. It looks great. The size is great. But, I consider it disposable:(
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Tilghman

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile piece of cloth, didn't like the knots at the ends tho
customer_reviews.author: Alice L.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning colors..  awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful I bought a blue one and a purple one. I get alot of compliments on both of them. I orinally bought them becuz I had rotator cuff surgery and needed something comfortable to lay around in. Now I use it as a cover up to go to the pool. They r beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pattern
customer_reviews.text: I had read a review saying it wasn't large enough so I purchased two of them thinking I could sew them together. However the size was just fine for probably almost anyone so I'll send the other back. I love my sarong. The fabric is beautiful and the fringe trim is perfect. Simple to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Trokey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft material, well made. Came with a bonus island-style bracelet. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Andrade

customer_reviews.title: It fits great as a sarong but
customer_reviews.text: It fits great as a sarong but, when I tried to make a dress (as the helpful insert suggested) I was a tad short on material to make it go around my neck to tie it...and I'm a size 10 petite normally. No worries, I bought it to wear as a sarong. I love the vibrant colors and the very Hawaiian/Polynesian fabric design. Just waiting to get to the islands to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonno

customer_reviews.title: Great Sarong/Pareo/Cover up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sarong to take on a trip and use as a skirt, dress or cover-up! It's a very cute pattern and very generous in size. This will be my go to piece for my upcoming trip! The material (thickness, etc) is perfect, something you'd be able to purchase in a department store.
customer_reviews.author: Brendalynn

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: This sarong is great. The size is perfect and it's extremely soft (even before I washed it). It also looks just like the picture. I got the black and turquoise one. The only con is that it's a little faded along the edge (see the pic) but I'm okay with that since it's so soft. I highly recommend it and I plan to buy more from this same company.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Vickson

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these!! I love them so much that I went and bought three more. They're very comfortable and perfect for the beach and pool.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong picking one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple and black hibiscus to take on vacation. I love the color, it’s very pretty. Nice light thin fabric. Perfect for a beach wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a quick cover up for vacation. It was great to wear as a skirt on our way to the beach and when we wanted to eat in one of the restaurants with a no swim suit policy I just tied it up like a dress and voila no issues! I searched pinterest for different ways to tie it. I ended up only using it two ways but that was just my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful print and generous length
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty! The fabric is really soft, too, so it's very comfortable to wear. If you're short, you'll need to bunch up or fold over the waist to keep it from being too long (tripping length). It has a fussy care label, but I just ignored it and tossed it in a regular load. The fringed edges looked a little tangled when it came out of the dryer, but they smoothed out when I ran my fingers through them. I would happily have paid more. :)
customer_reviews.author: T.K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 18 in jeans and I have a "big booty" so i was afraid this may be too small-fits perfectly! I wrap it around and there is still plenty of room so it looks nice and flowy, not tight at all. Material is soft, feels nice against my skin. Pattern is super pretty. Check the measurements before you purchase, that's what I did. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: KimmySofrito

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover easy to make it differnt covers u can use it as a skirt or dress
customer_reviews.author: Cintia

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on the size since I am using it as a curtain in my weird little bohemian office but, its a Sarong. They are all pretty much the same size. The colors are exactly as shown on line and very pretty. I didn't wash it so I'm not sure how it will hold up but, it looks great in my window.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Teen daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute way to cover up! My 17 yo daughter saw my brown sarong, and wanted one in a print to coordinate with her suit. She loves trying the different ways to wear it and I love that she has something to keep her modestly covered going to and from the beach or pool. She is a size 8, but I am an 18 and I can wear it as well. Highly recommend the coconut sarong ties, since tying it by hand can be bulky, doesn't stay tied, or if you knot it and it gets wet, it's really hard to untie. We now have 3 sarongs because we love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors and great fabric!
customer_reviews.text: Loved my first so much I ordered more of them! High quality fabric and large enough area to cover everything you want covered - easy to change your look as a skirt, sarong, dress tied at the top, VERY versatile. Super vivid colors, too. Love this sarong!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected. It got kind of weird wearing it in the water, though. It started getting tangled up in the tube of the lazy river. Overall, it was a good buy, but I'm just not sure it was good for the price. This is getting a 4 star review because I looked really good in it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bally

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover up
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the aqua blue / black sarong to match a swimsuit. Just an FYI the aqua blue is allot darker than pictured. It is more turquoise & cobalt than the aqua blue. Although it is listed as colors will vary did not think it would be allot darker. The colors I received 'turquoise & cobalt' on black works for me though. It better matches the swimsuit I purchased. The seller was quick to respond on shipping & very fast on delivery!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sarong! The material and design are beautiful and it fits like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm027

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just like the ones in hawaii
customer_reviews.text: I love collecting sarongs... havnt been able to fly to Hawaii to get family made ones so I ordered one instead.. still just as good!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, easy fit!
customer_reviews.text: Another hit. Print and colors are beautiful...I can't wait to wear it over my bathing suit on the cruise. However, I can't figure out how to wrap it around my neck. I am short 5 feet..so I just tied it around and ties the two ends in the front. Looks great! Maybe I will order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie RG

customer_reviews.title: Has fringe.
customer_reviews.text: The sarong was fine, but your description said "fringeless" and it definitely has fringe. That was the reason I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Heit

product_meta.title: 1 World Sarongs Womens Hibiscus Flower Swimsuit Sarong
feature_bullets: AMAZING MATERIAL - Made of top quality lightweight rayon fabric that is perfect for any destination. Super soft, silky and smooth, you'll enjoy its breathability and it gets nicer with every wash

PREMIER RESORT AND BEACH FASHION - We offer beautiful designs which are top quality and well-priced. Shop for sarongs & scarves for men & women, beach clothing like sundresses, summer dresses, long dresses, silver jewelry and so much more. All designs are exclusively owned and sold by 1 World Sarongs ™

BEAUTIFUL DESIGN - You will receive many compliments when you wear this gorgeous floral cover-up. This stylish sarong will brighten up your day plus it helps to protect your skin from over sun exposure
PRODUCT FEATURE - Fringed style sarong with hibiscus floral art design that measures approximately 66 x 44 inches (168 cm x 112 cm)

VERSATILE & FUNCTIONAL - Wear it as a beach cover-up, skirt, dress, top, a shawl or whatever your heart desires. You’ll find that our sarongs are perfect for so many occasions and uses such as picnics, home décor, costume parties or festival wear

FITS MOST - Our cover-ups have been used on almost every type of body. Whether you're tall and wide or short and thin, your sarong will be your best friend. With a little creativity and experimentation, you'll find it to be one of your best accessories. Easy to adjust according to your style and body dimensions!

SOCIALLY CONSCIOUS BRAND - Each product of 1 World Sarongs is carefully hand created by artists who take the time and energy to produce the best product possible. Your purchase makes it possible for us to help and give back where we can. Thanks for getting involved!
